word_mean: pseudo-adiabatic diagram  描写大气假绝热过程的图解。
pseudo-equivalent potential temperature 未饱和的湿空气微团先经干绝热过程上升到饱和，再经假绝热过程，使水汽全部凝结(降落地面)，后经干绝热过程压缩到气压为1 000hPa 处所具有的温度。这是对应于绝热相当温度的位温。
pseudo-color cloud picture  将一个波段(通道)的图象上几个灰度等级范围分别赋以不同颜色而得到的一种彩

sentence.Network_en: What a load of pompous, pseudo-intellectual rot.

sentence.Network_en: He rubbed his cheek with pseudo ruefulness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他露出假装悔恨的表情摸摸自己的脸颊.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: independent use of pseudo-

encyclopedia.content: 形容词a. 1.假的；冒充的 名词n. 1.【口】假冒的人；伪君子 1. [sham;palm off a fake as genuine]∶以假充真 只要人们以事实而不是以假冒为根据 2. [adulterate]∶冒用其它商品牌名 出售假冒商品 3. [personate]∶冒充 假冒别人的名义招摇撞骗

entry.tran: （用于构成形容词和名词）表示“假”，“伪”，“冒牌”
entry.def: Pseudo- is used to form adjectives and nouns that indicate that something is not the thing it is claimed to be. For example, if you describe a country as a pseudo-democracy, you mean that it is not really a democracy, although its government claims that it is.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who makes deceitful pretenses
1. (often used in combination) not genuine but having the appearance of;
